values.code: getTimeZone(offset: Int, dst: Boolean, when: Long, country: String!)
values.desc: Tries to return a time zone that would have had the specified offset and DST value at the specified moment in the specified country.
Returns a String indicating the version of the time zone database currently in use.
Returns time zone IDs for time zones known to be associated with a country.

values.code: isTimeBetween(reference: LocalTime, start: LocalTime, end: LocalTime)
values.desc: This method is used to find if a clock time is inclusively between two other clock times
